snippet: The indictment was the first sign of a promised crackdown on settlers whose increasingly provocative actions have been described by some Israeli officials as homegrown terrorism.
abstract: Israeli prosecutors charge five radical Jewish settlers with tracking troop movements in the West Bank and organizing a raid on an Israeli Army base in December; indictment is the first sign of a promised crackdown on settlers whose increasingly provocative actions have been described by some Israeli officials as homegrown terrorism.
lead_paragraph: The indictment was the first sign of a promised crackdown on settlers whose increasingly provocative actions have been described by some Israeli officials as homegrown terrorism.

headline.seo: Israel Charges 5 Settlers in Clash at Army Base
headline.main: Israel Charges 5 Settlers in West Bank Army Base Clash
headline.print_headline: Israel Charges 5 Settlers in Army Base Clash, Linking Them to Illegal Outposts
